sitedata.title: Business Class Flights to France
sitedata.paragraph: France is located in Western Europe and is known for its eclectic culture. The gourmet food, famous art, and detailed architecture create a romantic atmosphere unparalleled to any other country. Here are 5 can't miss recommendations to experience in France.

bulletpoints.title: Saint Germain
bulletpoints.text: aint Germain is often a favorite neighborhood in Paris. The best way to explore is on foot. It's highly recommended to take a walking tour with a twist. Explore many different bakeries and chocolate shops. Experience the vibrant neighborhood. Around every corner, you have cafes and people spilling onto the streets.
